page.title: 18FAMILY LIFE WEST OF BATH
page.content: My brother usually wakes at 6o'clock to do a paper round.My Dad gets up at 6.30,then me at 7.50 and Mum about 8.00.We all get our own breakfast of two pieces of toast and sit and watch T.V.Dad has gone to work before we see him and doesn't get home before 20.00 I leave for school about 8.30 and get home about 16.00.My Mum works from 9.30 until 15.30 and when she gets home usually reads a book and watches T.V.I watch with her until we have a cooked tea at 17.30.I then play until 19.30 and go home and get ready for bed about 21.30.My older brother does homework and goes to his bedroom at 21.00.When Dad gets home he has supper and watches T.V. until 23.30.Mum stays up a bit later until 01.00.
